Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-51257 affecting package jasper for versions less than 4.2.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-51257 affecting package jasper for versions less than 4.2.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package jasper is earlier than 4.2.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-51257
